Position: HR Business Partner & Head of C&B
Consulting executives on HR needs CANDIDATE 		Samir Besher
PERSONAL DETAILS

CAREER SUMMARY
July 2006 to date Lafarge Emirates Cement (Holcim International Group)
Oct 2020 to date
Position: HR Business Partner & Head of C&B
Consulting executives on HR needs
Proposing HR initiatives in line with business objectives to the Board of Directors
Providing support to HR thought partnership
Providing or suggesting coaching to groups of employees or individual employees
Facilitating organizational design and development
Managing leadership coaching and team building that support growth and change in line with business objectives
Proactively assessing team and manager development needs, recommend and implement relevant solutions
Performing data analysis and reporting solutions based on business needs
Implementing talent management strategies
Implementing employee engagement strategy
Integrating with coworkers in other departments to help scale the business
Partnering with regional HR partners on global strategy
Mar 2017 to Sept 2020
Position: Compensation & Benefits Manager
Develops and implements Reward Strategy including Salary Structure and Benchmarking, Benefits management and Annual Compensation events such as Bonus and Salary review. Submit a proposal if deem necessary.
Manages salary classification and Compensation programs and conducts analysis of compensation and Benefits plans
Assists and collaborates, as appropriate, in the planning, coordination, facilitation, administration, and reporting of the Annual Salary review program for staff and Company employees
Reviewing Sales Incentive Schemes comparing market practice and suggest improvements to be align with UAE Market
Identifies and allocates Annual Staff Budgeting Forecast including (Increment, Medical Inflation, Bonus, for each department and ensures compliance to allocations.
Participates in the bidding for vendor selection for medical insurance to ensure the best plan is selected as per budget availability.
Advises and recommends on benefits management and exceptions including Medical insurance, annual Air Tickets, and school fees.
Reviews and assigns jobs to the existing structure through Job Evaluation to ensure compliance and equity.
Managing Promotion cases (Job Evaluation , Preparing Compensation proposal, Communicate with HRD) to ensure that align with Policy & Budgeting
Creates and reviews Compensation & Benefits policies and procedures to ensure compliance with Ministry of Labor
Reviews final settlement calculations for leaving employees and manages the exit procedures.
Provides integrated advice and consultation on strategic compensation management, organization and job design, individual compensation/classification concerns and other associated compensation & benefits issues
Mar 2013 to Feb 2017
Position: Payroll & HRIS Support Manager
Managing and reviewing the monthly Payroll of four (4) Business Units such as Lafarge Emirates Cement, Ready Mix Gulf, Ecocem & Lafarge International Limited and ensure it process in an accurate manner. (+400 Employees)
Responsible for managing and ensure the information in Workday (HRIS) for updating employee’s personal file and the database (ERP), update the employee details in ERP for Lafarge BU in UAE, Oman & Kuwait
Dealing with Finance Team about all staff cost reports such as Air Ticket, Medical insurance, End of Service, etc for monthly accruals.
Responsible for the preparation annual Budgeting Forecast for all employee’s related cost.
Reviewing the final settlement of leaving staff and ensure the accuracy of calculation before the approval of HRD & CEO
Jul 2006 to Feb 2013
Position: Se

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
